name: Staff of Mithral Might
body:
Usage held in 1 hand
This staff is made of silver, with a shimmering sphere of mithral at either end. One end features a golden snake wrapped around the staff and cradling the larger of these two mithral spheres. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify transmutation magic.

The staff also functions as a +2 greater striking staff.

Activate Cast a Spell; Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Price 4,000 gp
Bulk 1
Cantrip sigil
1st fleet step, jump
2nd enlarge, humanoid form
3rd feet to fins, jump
4th gaseous form, shape stone
5th humanoid transformation
6th baleful polymorph, dragon form, flesh to stone
